title: Implement Secure Login
description: As a user, I want secure login with multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure my account is protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Multi-factor authentication; Strong encryption; Secure session management; Compliance with banking regulations and industry standards
core_domain_objects: User Authentication; Data Encryption; Session Management
acceptance_criteria: User is prompted for multi-factor authentication; Data is encrypted in transit and at rest; Sessions are managed securely; Compliance with regulatory standards
test_cases: Given multi-factor authentication is configured, When a user logs in, Then they are prompted for a second form of authentication. Given data transmission, When sending user data, Then the data is encrypted. Given an active session, When user is inactive, Then the session times out securely.

title: Develop Personalized Dashboard
description: As a user, I want an adaptive dashboard that displays personalized banking services, so that I can easily access relevant information and services.
attributes_and_rules: Customizable dashboard; Based on customer profiles; Provides actionable insights; Well-structured interface
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard is customizable; Information is based on user profile; Insights are actionable and relevant
test_cases: Given a user profile, When user logs in, Then dashboard displays personalized information. Given customizable settings, When user adjusts dashboard, Then displayed information matches preferences.

epic_title: Responsive Portal Design and Cross-Device Compatibility
title: Ensure Responsive Design
description: As a user, I want a seamless experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices, so that I can manage my banking needs from any device.
attributes_and_rules: Responsive front-end architecture; Performance optimization; Accessibility compliance; Consistent look and feel
acceptance_criteria: Layout adjusts dynamically; Performance is optimized; Accessible across all devices
test_cases: Given desktop view, When user accesses portal, Then layout adjusts accordingly. Given mobile device, When user accesses portal, Then layout is optimized for mobile use.

epic_title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification
title: Enable Digital Account Opening
description: As a user, I want to open new accounts and modify existing services online, so that I can manage my banking tasks efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Streamlined workflows; Real-time data validation; Guided tooltips; Backend system integration
acceptance_criteria: Workflows are streamlined; Data validation in real-time; Guided tooltips provided
test_cases: Given account opening, When user submits request, Then workflow is streamlined. Given modification request, When user adjusts services, Then data is validated in real-time.

epic_title: Document Upload and Draft Saving Functionality
title: Enable Document Uploads
description: As a user, I want to securely upload documents and save incomplete applications, so that I can complete submissions at my convenience.
attributes_and_rules: Secure document upload; Draft-saving function; Encrypted storage
acceptance_criteria: Documents are uploaded securely; Drafts can be saved and resumed
test_cases: Given document upload, When user uploads, Then documents are stored securely. Given incomplete application, When user saves, Then draft is saved securely.

title: Implement Notification Engine
description: As a user, I want real-time notifications about request progress, so that I can stay informed about the status of my submissions.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates; Email alerts; In-portal notifications; Accessible updates section
acceptance_criteria: Notifications are real-time; Email alerts sent automatically; Progress visible within dashboard
test_cases: Given status change, When request progresses, Then notifications are sent in real-time. Given event trigger, When criteria met, Then email alert is sent.

title: Maintain User Interaction History
description: As a user, I want a log of all interactions and transactions, so that I can review my activity and ensure compliance.
attributes_and_rules: Comprehensive activity log; Searchable history; Auditable record; Regulatory compliance
acceptance_criteria: All interactions are logged; History is searchable; Records are auditable
test_cases: Given user interaction, When user submits, Then interaction is logged. Given transaction history, When user searches, Then history is retrieved accurately.

title: Integrate with Core Banking Systems
description: As a user, I want real-time synchronization with the bank's core systems, so that my details and transactions are always up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Seamless integration; Bidirectional data flow; High availability; Data integrity
acceptance_criteria: Integration is seamless; Data is synchronized in real-time; Systems are highly available
test_cases: Given data change, When updated, Then data synchronizes with core system. Given system availability, When accessed, Then data is consistent and up-to-date.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Develop Dedicated Portal Database
description: As a user, I want a separate, optimized database supporting portal operations, so that my data access and transactions are fast and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: High-performance database; Redundancy; Indexing optimization; Backup recovery
acceptance_criteria: Database handles user data efficiently; Backup and recovery processes are implemented; System is redundant and optimized
test_cases: Given data load, When accessed, Then database performance is optimized. Given failure, When backup, Then data is recovered successfully.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As a user, I want secure access controls based on defined roles and permissions, so that I can only access relevant features and data.
attributes_and_rules: RBAC model; Segregation of permissions; User authorization management
acceptance_criteria: Access is role-based; Permissions are segregated; Users access relevant data
test_cases: Given user role, When accessing portal, Then access is granted based on permissions. Given role change, When updated, Then permissions reflect new role.
